title: What’s your list of the top ten laptops in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: When we think about buying a new laptop price is the first thing that comes in our mind. I am going to suggest some laptops that are under Rs.40,000. Top 10 Laptops in 2020 : 1.ASUS VIVOBOOK X407UA  PRICE : 39,990 INR 2. LENOVO IDEAPAD 330  PRICE : 37,990 INR 3. ACER ASPIRE 3  PRICE : 34,990 INR 4. LENOVO IDEAPAD L340  PRICE : 36,990 INR 5. ASUS VIVOBOOK 15X512FA  PRICE : 33,599 INR 6. AVITA LIBER CORE I5 8 GEN  PRICE : 41,500 INR 7. LENOVO IDEAPAD S145  PRICE : 29, 999 INR 8. ACER SWIFT 3  PRICE : 32,299 INR 9.HP 15 CORE I3  PRICE : 35,000 INR 10. ASUS X507  PRICE : 39,949 INR.  NOTE : The price of the above laptops is not actual price which can be change.  I also wanted to write the about the good side and bad side of the above laptops. But if i write then the answer will so long.
